ATTENTION, CATS OF PAWSVILLE (Open Source)

The Beasts of the city have taken over our domain. The Wolves, Opossums and Rats have swarmed each alley and trashcan that once was ours. Destroy our enemies, collect upgrades, and paint the world in pretty colors while you're at it!

SplatCat is an open world 2D soulslike game. Some NPCs will give you directional hints, though you are free to roam the cityscape at your own risk.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Arrows - Shoot
  • Shift - Dash
  • Interact - Space
  • Hold M - Minimap

Currently missing features (at JAM end):

  • Two Minibosses, and the Final Boss. There is a boss arena in the top left though if you want to hear the really cool boss theme...
  • Balancing
  • Destructable Objects, Bombs
  • Functionality for Painting Perks (maybe)

Features:

  • Rat, Opossum and Wolf enemies
  • 13 items modifying your combat and abilities
  • Multiple Boss arenas

Main objective:

Defeat the alpha in the middle of the map. You're not locked into any specific map areas, so you can do so without collecting any upgrades or visiting any other areas.

ITEMS:

Super Catfood Can

Effect: +10% Max health

Minor Fish

Effect: You regenerate 10 % of your Max. Health

Greater Fish

Effect: You go back to full health

Extra Projectile

Effect: You shoot +1 Projectile (max. +2)

Paws of Swiftness

Effect: You gain +10% Bonus Movementspeed

Paws of Gliding 

Effect: If you are in your own paint, you gain +20% Bonus Movementspeed and +10% Bonus Attackspeed.

Triple Projectiles

Effect: You also shoot two more projectiles to the sides, when attacking, but you have 20% decreased accuracy

Slingshot

Effect: +10% Bonus Attackspeed, but -5% accuracy

Big Projectile

Effect: You shoot 50% larger Projectiles, but have -5% accuracy

Bigger Brush

Effect: Your Attacks colour a 20% larger area

Sling Tail

Effect: You also shoot one extra Projectile to the back, when attacking

Special Concoction

Effect: Your Projectiles move 20% faster, but you have -5% accuracy

Catvision

Effect: Your Projectiles get more range and you get +10% accuracy + smaller projectiles
